statements: SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations;
SELECT conversation_id, user_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations;
SELECT conversation_id, user_id, message_text FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM chatbot_conversations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT conversation_id, user_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT conversation_id, message_text, timestamp, user_id FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE timestamp > '2023-01-01';
SELECT user_id, timestamp, conversation_id, message_text FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE message_text LIKE '%hello%';
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT conversation_id, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = '987e6543-12d3-45a6-4266-174023456789' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations;
SELECT conversation_id, user_id, message, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username, membership_status FROM chatbot_users WHERE membership_status = TRUE;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM chatbot_users ORDER BY last_login ASC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT message, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT username, last_login FROM chatbot_users ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM chatbot_conversations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT user_id, message FROM chatbot_conversations JOIN chatbot_users ON chatbot_conversations.user_id = chatbot_users.user_id WHERE membership_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ChatbotConversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM ChatbotConversations WHERE user_id = 100 AND bot_id = 200;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM ChatbotConversations GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_messages DESC;
SELECT c.message, u.username FROM ChatbotConversations c JOIN Users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY c.timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT b.bot_name, COUNT(c.conversation_id) AS total_conversations FROM Bots b LEFT JOIN ChatbotConversations c ON b.bot_id = c.bot_id GROUP BY b.bot_name ORDER BY total_conversations DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ChatbotConversations WHERE message LIKE '%hello%';
SELECT bot_name, bot_description FROM Bots ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM ChatbotConversations GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_messages DESC;
SELECT conversation_id, bot_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM ChatbotConversations GROUP BY conversation_id, bot_id ORDER BY latest_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT conversation_id, start_date, end_date FROM conversations ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT message_text, sender_id, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT response_text, timestamp FROM chatbot_responses WHERE response_type = 'greeting';
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT message_text, sender_id FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT u.username, c.start_date, c.end_date FROM users u INNER JOIN conversations c ON u.user_id = c.user1_id;
SELECT response_text, response_type FROM chatbot_responses WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT bot_id, bot_name FROM bots ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT message_text, sender_id FROM messages WHERE conversation_id=12345;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_ratings FROM ratings;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email, age FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT bot_name, language FROM bots WHERE version > 1.5 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT conversation_id, rating, comment FROM ratings WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
